description: Rear roof extension, and installation of one roof light to front and rear roof slopes
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled: GD2243/01, GD2243/02 Rev.C, GD2243/03, GD2243/04
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| No windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| The hereby approved rooflights to the front and rear roof slopes of the approved development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
